name: Mushroom and Fennel Salad
keywords: fennel, mushroom, red bell pepper, raw, vegan, vegetarian, winter
recipeIngredient: 1 cup fennel, cut in julienne strips
2 red bell peppers, cut in thin julienne strips
Freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Wash and remove stems from mushrooms. Combine with fennel and peppers in salad bowl.
Beat oil and vinegar with whisk. Beat in garlic, bay leaf and black pepper. Pour dressing over vegetables and mix gently.
The salad can be refrigerated for several hours. To serve, toss gently again.
